hps.datasets package¶

Submodules¶

hps.datasets.downloader module¶

hps.datasets.downloader.get_file_from_url(url, filename)¶

hps.datasets.foxp1_folding module¶

hps.datasets.foxp1_folding.download_dataset(output_dir, dcd_only=False, data_only=False, overwrite=False)¶

Download the dataset in the specified location.

output_dirstr

Path to the output directory where to store the files.

dcd_onlybool

Get only DCD trajectories files?

data_onlybool

Get only energy DATA files?

overwritebool

Delete and replace all dataset files?

hps.datasets.foxp1_folding.pathsToDATAfiles()¶

Method to contain paths to DATA files in the dataset

hps.datasets.foxp1_folding.pathsToDCDfiles()¶

Method to contain paths to DCD files in the dataset
